home_description: Begin your journey with the essence of Vietnamese cuisine
home_brand_story: Born from a deep understanding of travelers’ needs when having airport dining experiences, The Kitchen mission is to present a warm, comfortable, and authentic Vietnamese cuisine. Each dish not only brings flavor, but also a story of culture, a celebration of the essence of Vietnam.
home_brand_mission: We aspire to become a trusted spot for every traveler – a place to rest and relax and to indulge in unique and emotional culinary experiences.
home_menu_description: Each dish is prepared using the finest ingredients.
home_reservation_subtitle: Reserve your seat online. Confirmation will be sent to your email
pho_types: Rare | Brisket | Flank | Fatty Brisket Pho
reservation_form_success: Reservation successful! We will contact you soon.
reservation_form_network_error: Unable to send information. Please try again.
home_t3_subtitle: TAN SON NHAT AIRPORT, HO CHI MINH CITY, VIETNAM
home_t3_paragraph_1: A Vietnamese culinary space in the heart of Terminal 3 - Tan Son Nhat Internaltional Airport, where every guest is warmly welcomed before each journey.
home_t3_paragraph_2: After completing your check-in procedures, please proceed to the area opposite Gate 17 on the 3rd floor.
home_footer_about_text: Born from a deep understanding of travelers’ needs when enjoying airport dining services, The Kitchen was created with a mission: to bring a warm, comfortable, and authentic Vietnamese dining experience. Each dish is not only flavor, but also a story of culture — offering a complete taste of Vietnamese culinary essence amid the bustle of every journey.
home_footer_contact_address: 82 Nguyen Huu Huan Street, Hoan Kiem Ward, Hanoi
